Generation VI.X: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
Generation VI.Y: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

Generation VII.Sun: This Pokémon is said to devour anyone daring to ravage the forest. To the creatures dwelling in the forest, it offers great kindness.
Generation VII.Moon: Through its roots, it exerts control over other trees. A deadly curse falls upon anyone cutting down trees in forests where Trevenant dwell.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It's feared as a ghost of the forest. Lumberjacks bring along Fire types, which Trevenant hates, when they enter the forest.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This Pokémon controls trees via roots stretching from its feet, and it will attack anyone that dares to ravage the forest.

Generation VIII.Sword: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it's kind.
Generation VIII.Shield: Small roots that extend from the tips of this Pokémon's feet can tie into the trees of the forest and give Trevenant control over them.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Using its roots, Trevenant connects itself to trees and monitors every corner of its forest. It uses curses to drive intruders away.
Generation IX.Violet: Trevenant is very kind to Pokémon living in the forest. It doesn't even care if these Pokémon take up residence in the greenery on its head.

Generation VIII.Sword: Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Dappled Grove , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Old Cemetery , Snowslide Slope ( Wanderer ) Slippery Slope , Old Cemetery , Giant's Foot , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Kitakami Wilds , Timeless Woods Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
